channel.title: Machine Learning on Sagar Bhujbal
channel.description: Recent content in Machine Learning on Sagar Bhujbal

item.title: Project 3: Breast Cancer Classification and clustering
item.description: In this project,I aimed to create a computerised system which can classify two different (Bening and Malignant cases) using various classification methods and later also used clustering techniques. For this project data from following website is used.Link to repository When primary analysis is done I found out that Data has total 32 attributes and outof which 30 attributes are real.There were 357 Benign and 212 malignant cases present in the data.
